text:
App Annie | Senior iOS Engineer | Utrecht (city centre), NL | Full-time

App Annie Utrecht office is looking for iOS Engineer. We bring the best B2C utility apps to iOS. This engineer plays a key role in shaping the experiences of millions of users as you work directly with our engineers, supported by our design, product and marketing teams, worldwide. Our mission is to help businesses do "The Math Behind the App Stores". Our products enable you to make educated business decisions about the app store ecosystem. Our technology infrastructure, analytics platforms, advanced statistical models and our ass-kicking engineers make this all possible.

You bring: 3+ years of iOS / Objective-C development experience, Swift is a plus. Experiences in tools like XCode, Instruments, Interface Builder etc.; knowledge of the iOS networking stack and mobile networks in general is a serious plus.

For more information and to apply, visit here: http://hire.jobvite.com/CompanyJobs/Careers.aspx?k=Job&c=qxJ...
